gutxt: I'll start my review with thanks to your support service, guys. Initially, I was terribly struggling with connecting through the API, but Andrey patiently answered all my questions. In the second month of working, I decided to join the academy to get up to speed and understand where to get many accounts for trading. Now I'm applying the knowledge and trying not to bother support too much)) I attach my first result to the review.
latxt: My best decision in 2024 was to pull myself together and buy your software, guys. I won't lie, everything didn't go smoothly right away. It took me about a week and a half to figure out how to set it up, where to get accounts, how to trade correctly, etc. But hunger is not a joke, and I threw myself into work. As a result, I have my own group with accounts and juicy withdrawals from brokers you connect to. I don't know what else to say except THANK YOU!!!
lmtxt: I saw your ad post in a traders' chat and decided to try the Basic version, back then it was still called Binary. At first, I didn't try too hard and worked with suppliers of accounts for Pocket Option. A couple of months later, the Plus update came out, and I decided to play big - I bought a subscription for a month) I don't know about others, but I liked Expert Option the most, withdrawals seem faster there, and trading is better too. I think I'll stick to the Plus version, I won't bother with Forex)))
rstxt: If my review is uploaded to the site, I want to tell all newcomers: DON'T BE AFRAID TO TRY. If I had stayed with the familiar stuff and didn't switch to Profit Prime, I would never have learned about Intrade and Binomo, which ensured me a summer vacation within a month. Communicate in chats, follow updates, and constantly test brokers — everything is in your hands!
satxt: Right now, I'm eagerly waiting for your AI. If Plus brought me (if you're from the tax office, don't read this) $15k from all accounts, I can only imagine what I'll buy with the withdrawals from AI. Guys, keep pushing hard, there's nothing more to say. GAAAAZ!
sdtxt: I was among the lucky ones who first received the Binomo update. Guys, it was a real gold rush on binary options)) Special thanks to Matvey. If he hadn't shared the account supplier with me, I wouldn't have been able to withdraw so much. Now I continue to work with Binarium and plan to join the academy to master Forex. Best wishes!
rmtxt: At the start I bought only a system for Forex trading. I understood the instructions and tried to set up the settings myself. I managed to make 20% a day, but I wanted more. I decided to ask the guys how I could increase my profit. I joined the academy and immediately studied the guide on selecting brokers and setting up trading pairs. I was lucky, I even found a guy in the chat room who deals with accounts. Of course, I have room to grow, but I'm doing pretty good now. The trades from one of the accounts on the video. Good luck to everyone!
matxt: I tried trading Pocket Option with a basic robot, the balance was spinning as it should) When I was able to fully concentrate on trading, I took a plugin to trade any brokers, and the academy to know where to take accounts in bulk. I'm working for the 6th month with 4 brokers, thanks to the guys - everything is clear).
avtxt: Before binary options I was interested in crypto and NFT. Now I wish I had learned about trading robots earlier, I would not have lost dozens of hours on all sorts of giveaways and dogicoins. I understood the instructions, connected the plugin and started trading. Nothing complicated, I, even as a journalism student, paid off in 2 days of hard work. I plan to buy access to the academy and master the great and terrible forex market)))
vstxt: I have been trading with the help of robots for several years now. Before that, I used products from the Orange company, but I was a little disappointed with their support service and the list of available brokers. I switched to Profit Prime relatively recently, 5 months ago. The plugin opened a new level of trading for me, which I had not thought about before. Now I'm experimenting and checking out the 'fat' brokers. It is cool that in the chat academy there are account providers, which greatly simplifies the work. I am satisfied with the product for binaroks, I will try the software for forex.
mktxt: God forbid, I saw the guys' advertisement before I started trading manually. Of course, I didn't buy a key right away, I read about trading systems, looked at reviews. I figured out how it works, realized that everything is logical and it is not a 'dough button'. After the salary I bought software for forex. Guys, I don't know how you found your developers, but it's cannon. What's cool about the academy is that you can quickly learn about new pairs if the broker dramatically inflates the spread. I'm just starting my 'way' in trading, so I can't boast of impressive amounts of long-time participants of the academy, but it's already tasty enough).
rttxt: Before Profit Prime, I was learning to trade forex manually, plotting charts and testing strategies. I was skeptical about the idea of robots, but when I read the working principle, I decided to try it. I practiced on demo-accounts for two weeks to make sure that it worked. The chat suggested that on the real account you need to take into account the commission when setting up, so we did without the 'first pancake', trading is going great to this day, I am already working on a farm of accounts. As a person who has tried both manual and automated trading methods, I can say that this is the best solution for beginners. .
zbtxt: My acquaintance with Profit Prime began a year ago. Then I wrote to them to get back the $500 I had lost on Pocket Option. I was surprised when they funded my account themselves and did not ask for a 'prepayment' as other traders I had written to before had done. At first I thought that nothing would work out, but after 1.000$ plus I couldn't stand it anymore and asked them how they did it. They told me about programs that can trade without my participation. I decided to take a risk and bought a key with the money I earned with the guys. Almost a year has passed since that day, and I do not regret this decision one bit. To be honest, it became a little sad when I realized that my salary for a month could be earned by some clever machine in one evening :/
katxt: The first months I worked only with Pocket Option. I got too carried away and increased my balance to 7.000$, because of which it was blocked. Even though I withdrew $2.000$ from it, I still resent Pocket Option. I decided to try new brokers, but it turned out that the same Binarium introduces a delay of 10 seconds before opening a deal. So I wrote to the guys to get access to the plugin and the academy. The academy explained to me where to get accounts and what amounts to withdraw so that they would not be blocked. I figured out the plugin, now I trade on Olymp Trade and Binarum, no questions asked, the software developers are great.
rvtxt: For me, my introduction to Profit Prime was as spontaneous as possible. It was coincidental that I saw the advertisement when I was thinking about what to do after my previous job. I signed up, looked at the results, read about binary options, and, as they say, I was hooked. The first week I just read the chat and wrote out important details like time intervals with good volatility for trading software. That's why I had already removed the delay with a plugin and started to beat the subscription. At the end of the month, satisfied as an elephant, I withdrew the first in my life 107.000 on trading and renewed the subscription. My advice to beginners: don't be lazy and work every day, the subscription can be paid off in an evening. Thanks to Matvey for answering my stupid questions at the beginning!
boxtxt1: Five years ago, we started our journey as a team of trader-developers, securing brokerages. We developed software solutions to protect against arbitrage teams, saving millions of dollars for big brokers like .
boxtxt2: Over the years of interacting with the biggest players in the market, we have learned not only all the intricacies of their work, but also the unpleasant truth about how they treated their clients.
box3txt1: For more than 3 years we have been developing advanced trading systems that help beginner traders not only to recover lost funds, but also to start really earning on trading.
box3txt2: Our company is actively developing the integration of artificial intelligence into trading systems to fully automate the analysis and opening of trades. at the moment we have launched 4 absolutely unique products that bypass all existing limitations on the part of the broker.
box2txt: Artificial delay before opening trades, sharp spread widening and slippage when opening orders - all this made us change the vector of the company's development.
box4txt: We not only consult with clients to find the most suitable product for comfortable trading, but also accompany them on the whole way of working together. this is our main principle, thanks to which we have been chosen by thousands of experts and beginners in trading for 3 years already.
a2: We offer 24/7 support and regular updates to keep your systems running flawlessly.
q3: Will I be able to earn without a subscription to Profit
a3: Yes, of course, the trading system and the user manual are enough to start earning. The Academy gives you access to private information about choosing brokers and developing your own strategy, as well as to the private chat room of traders from our team.
a4: All future updates are free during the term of your key.
a5: Our systems are suitable for beginners and professionals alike, thanks to a clear interface, detailed user manual and free consultations.
q6: Do your systems jeopardize the security of my
a6: The security of your data is guaranteed by state-of-the-art encryption methods and we have a strict privacy policy.
q7: Will the program work on my
a7: The program is optimized to work on various platforms and operating systems.

name: Name
f1: To maximize profit, traders have access to two trading modes based on gap and impulse analysis.
f3: During operation, the trading system uses special algorithms to check the speed of data transmission of current quotes. The speed is compared in two pairs: provider/broker and provider/trader.
f4: The trader always receives the data before the broker, so there is a possibility to get ahead - to open trades 1-2 seconds earlier than the broker receives the data. Thus, for the broker you as if 'predict' the price of the asset and earn on the correct forecast.
f6: The algorithm of this mode works as follows: the trader sets the value of an impulse - a price jump on the chart in one direction.
f7: Basic system tracks these movements in real time and instantly opens trades during sharp price changes.
f15: The Basic system allows you to connect directly to the servers of Pocket Option, Binarium, Close Option, Exnova and Binarycent brokers to work without a clicker, significantly increasing the speed and efficiency of trading.
f9: The smart algorithm uses methods such as price analysis and wave research, as well as considering numerous economic indicators to maximize the share of successful decisions.
f17: The Basic system allows manual adjustment of 'stop loss' and 'take profit,' enabling you to automate not only your strategy but also your risks.
f11: We provide access to quote data from the three fastest providers on the market, allowing you to choose the optimal setup for various brokers.
globtest1: Product moved to PROFIT PRIME PLUS system
f13: The Basic system is easily configurable to work simultaneously with multiple accounts, allowing you to effectively scale your earnings.
bintxt31: Extended version of Profit Prime Basic, which provides access to larger brokers and advanced features.
bintxt41: Improved trade masking, bypassing server delays and professional trading strategies - all the latest technologies in a familiar interface.
p1: In addition to all the features of the Basic version, the Profit Prime Plus trading system has a number of unique features:
p3: The system is adapted for direct connection to brokers Intrade Bar, Expert Option, Quotex, Olymp Trade, IQ Option, Binomo, which gives you the opportunity to significantly increase your trading income.
p5: The algorithm is set up to hide arbitrage trades from the broker in the background, so the user will not have to 'trade' the account manually for several hours before withdrawing funds.
p7: The reverse arbitrage algorithm allows you to trade on platforms previously unavailable due to server delays, greatly expanding your choice of brokers and strategies.
circ1: The innovative trading system combines algorithmic trading with artificial intelligence to conduct and optimize comprehensive market research based on the criteria of fundamental, indicator and technical analysis.
cir2: The algorithm not only minimizes risks when entering a trade, but also instantly adapts to sudden market changes related to events such as Corporate Reports, natural disasters and Political decisions.
cric1mob: The innovative trading system combines algorithmic trading with artificial intelligence to conduct and optimize comprehensive market research based on the criteria of fundamental, indicator and technical analysis.
cric2mob: An advanced trading system developed not only on the basis of algorithms for outperforming the broker, but also on professional strategies 'Smart Trading', 'Smart Money' and others. The system uses advanced technologies of big data analysis and historical statistics to recognize hidden patterns of market behavior.
cric3: An advanced trading system developed not only on the basis of algorithms for outperforming the broker, but also on professional strategies 'Smart Trading', 'Smart Money' and others.
cric4: The system uses advanced technologies of big data analysis and historical statistics to recognize hidden patterns of market behavior. This approach allows you to effectively manage your capital and maximize profits regardless of market conditions.
cric3mob: An advanced solution that combines various strategies for fully automated trading not only on FOREX brokers but also on crypto exchanges.Revolutionary algorithms take advantage of delays in data transmission between broker and quote provider.
cric5: Revolutionary algorithms take advantage of delays in data transmission between broker and quote provider, perform arbitrage between multiple accounts, and analyze historical correlations without your participation.
cric6: In addition, the system is supplemented with special algorithms for blurring trades and direct connection to the trading account, so it can open several dozens of orders simultaneously without arousing suspicion of the broker or the exchange.
cric4mob: Automated trading system, the algorithm of which analyzes quote providers on the sides of the broker and the trader, determining a profitable gap between them for the trader before opening a deal.The system always knows the asset rate 1-2 seconds earlier than the broker, which allows it to open trades in time, maximizing profit.
cric7: Automated trading system, the algorithm of which analyzes quote providers on the sides of the broker and the trader, determining a profitable gap between them for the trader before opening a deal.
cric8: The system always knows the asset rate 1-2 seconds earlier than the broker, which allows it to open trades in time, maximizing profit.
mb1: The system allows trading using a choice of four fully automated strategies.
mb2: A classic latency arbitrage strategy on a slow broker. Quotes from a fast broker are used to open trades on the slow broker.
mb3: The broker has fewer chances to detect the use of arbitrage or scalping on your account. Now, the duration of all trades exceeds the specified limits, and the opening prices of trades do not match the price gap. In the account history, all trades look chaotic — there are trades with different numbers of profit or loss points and different durations, which serves as a reliable method of masking and protecting your account.
mb4: The algorithm will select a pair of brokers from those you have added with the maximum price difference and will open a Buy trade at the lowest Ask price and a Sell trade at the highest Bid price. Profit will be earned when prices return to their range or when prices diverge in the opposite direction.
mb5: The main innovation in the algorithm is the trade entry model. Now, upon receiving an arbitrage signal, we do not open a trade but close one of the open trades in the lock, which allows us to avoid slippage and hide the location of the arbitrage entry from the broker's eyes.
mb7: Lack of connection to the Meta Trader terminal and abandonment of advisors increased the execution speed of orders by 30-50%. These are huge numbers because you can instantly open and close trades, avoiding slippage or reducing it to the minimum possible values.
mb9: Our traders will help you for free
